translation.Name: Greece Note Notice
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_1: As of the recent "Incident" we will no longer be using the above ground facilities. Due to this we will also no longer be sheltering survivors.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: For new schedules please visit the Armory.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_3: Thank you, and may all those lost rest in peace.
